item.title: 亚洲油轮堵塞情况加剧，俄罗斯海上滞留石油激增
item.description:
自 8 月底以来，水面上的俄罗斯石油数量增加了近 50%

。【原文：

The amount of Russian oil on the water has swelled by almost 50% since the end of August

】

item.title: 日元疲软为何会引发政府干预
item.description: 货币市场已经做好准备，应对日本政府可能采取的干预措施，以支撑疲软的日元。2025 年以来的贬值使进口更加昂贵，并推高了家庭成本。【原文：Currency markets have been braced for a possible intervention by the Japanese government to prop up a weak yen. The depreciation over the course of 2025 has made imports more expensive and pushed up households’ costs.】

item.title: 波兰寻求加入二十国集团为东欧发声
item.description: 波兰财政部长安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）表示，波兰希望成为世界最大经济体俱乐部--20 国集团（Group of 20）的常任理事国，以帮助代表生活水平迅速提高后充满活力的东欧。【原文：Poland seeks to become a permanent member in the Group of 20 — a club of the world’s biggest economies — to help represent dynamic Eastern Europe after a speedy advance in living standards, according to Finance Minister Andrzej Domanski.】

item.title: 美国石油制裁对俄罗斯的伤害还能持续多久？
item.description: 上周，乌拉尔原油出口价跌至每桶约 34 美元，与国际基准相比大打折扣。【原文：Urals crude tumbled to about $34 a barrel at the point of export last week, a deep discount to international benchmarks.】

item.title: 墨西哥年度通胀放缓，支持墨西哥银行下调关键利率
item.description: 本月早些时候，墨西哥的年度通胀率有所放缓，支持了墨西哥中央银行因预期物价压力减弱而延长降息周期的最新决定。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation slowed earlier this month, supporting the central bank’s latest decision to extend its cycle of interest rate cuts in anticipation of weaker price pressures.】

item.title: 巴西通胀率走低，投资者期待开始降息
item.description: 本月早些时候，巴西的年度通胀率放缓，符合预期，投资者正在思考央行行长们多久会开始放松其超紧货币政策。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation slowed in line with expectations earlier this month as investors ponder how soon central bankers will start unwinding their ultra-tight monetary policy.】

item.title: 农民反弹后斯塔默在遗产税问题上有所退缩
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党政府已将农业财产遗产税的起征点从 100 万英镑（140 万美元）提高到 250 万英镑，这是在与英国农民的长期争斗中做出的重大让步。【原文：Keir Starmer’s Labour government has raised the threshold for inheritance tax on agricultural property from £1 million ($1.4 million) to £2.5 million, a major concession in a long-running battle with British farmers.】

item.title: 内存芯片制造商称人工智能改变了兴衰周期
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将报道存储芯片行业不断变化的命运。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports on the changing fortunes of the memory chip industry.】

item.title: 沃尔玛如何在司机短缺的情况下成功招聘卡车司机
item.description: 旅途中的生活可能是孤独的，而对有些人来说，这正是旅途的魅力所在【原文：Life on the road can be lonely, and for some, that’s part of the appeal】

item.title: 高盛认为美国经济将在新的一年蓬勃发展，但花旗集团对此持怀疑态度
item.description: 高盛认为 2026 年的开局 "特别强劲"，而花旗集团则表示 "我们持怀疑态度"。【原文：Goldman Sachs sees “especially strong” start to 2026 while Citigroup says “we are skeptical”】

item.title: 意大利参议院通过包含罗马黄金归谁所有条款的预算案
item.description: 意大利参议院批准了 2026 年的预算，推进了抑制国家赤字的立法以及一项关于黄金储备所有权的有争议的修正案。【原文：Italy’s Senate approved a budget for 2026, advancing legislation that will tame the country’s deficit along with a contentious amendment over the ownership of its gold reserves.】

item.title: 葡萄牙房价飙升 18%，创有史以来最大涨幅
item.description: 葡萄牙的房价在第三季度再次创下历史新高，不断加剧的住房紧张迅速成为该国最大的政治热点之一。【原文：Home prices in Portugal posted another record jump in the third quarter, with the deepening housing squeeze fast becoming one of the country’s biggest political flashpoints.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯告诉《经济流》：欧洲央行必须保留选择性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行目前处于 "良好的位置"，但必须做好准备，一旦有必要，可以朝任何一个方向调整其货币政策设置。【原文：The European Central Bank is in a “good place” but must be prepared to adjust its monetary-policy settings in either direction should the need arise, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 廉价石油和美联储减息可能推动周期股 2026 年反弹
item.description:
分析师称，与经济周期相关的公司股票正处于一个近乎完美的环境中。【原文：

There’s a near-perfect environment for shares in companies tied to the economic cycle, analysts say.

】

item.title: 关税贸易扰乱市场，铜价首次触及 12,000 美元
item.description: 铜价创下每吨 12,000 美元以上的历史新高，因为严重的矿山停产和与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税议程有关的贸易混乱，使这种重要的工业金属有望创下 2009 年以来的最大年度涨幅。【原文：Copper hit a fresh all-time high above $12,000 a ton as severe mine outages and trade dislocations linked to US President Donald Trump’s tariff agenda put the crucial industrial metal on course for its biggest annual gain since 2009.】

item.title: 债券缓期偿付后，中国万科被 S&P 划为选择性违约
item.description: S&P全球评级公司周二将中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.）的评级下调至选择性违约，称该开发商最近的陆上债券展期是相当于违约的不良债务重组。【原文：S&P Global Ratings downgraded China Vanke Co. to selective default on Tuesday, labeling the developer’s recent onshore bond extension as a distressed debt restructuring tantamount to a default.】

item.title: 华尔街认为经济增长回升带动周期性产品反弹
item.description: 随着石油价格下降，美国经济将加速增长。随着通胀降温，美联储有可能降息。选股者正在寻找人工智能领域的替代品，美国消费者也在继续消费。【原文：US economic growth is set to accelerate with cheaper oil. Federal Reserve rate cuts are likely with inflation cooling. Stock pickers are looking for alternatives to artificial intelligence plays and the American consumer continues to spend.】

item.title: 乌克兰和平贸易在带来巨大收益后变得更加棘手
item.description: 乌克兰 "和平交易 "给 2025 年的市场带来了丰厚的回报，提升了理论上能从战争结束中获益的资产。波兰银行股、捷克克朗和乌克兰债务等都在今年年底出现反弹。【原文：The Ukraine “peace trade” delivered stellar returns in markets in 2025, lifting assets that theoretically stand to benefit from an end to the war. Polish bank stocks, the Czech koruna and Ukrainian debt are among those to have rallied to close out the year.】

item.title: 期权显示，美元创 2017 年以来最严重跌势仍将继续
item.description: 美元正走向八年来最弱的年度表现，期权市场发出的信号是，交易员们正准备在 2025 年的最后几个交易日迎接更多的下行。【原文：The dollar is heading for its weakest annual performance in eight years, and the options market is signaling that traders are preparing for more downside in the final sessions of 2025.】

item.title: 南非 Eskom 公司修订分拆计划令债权人震惊
item.description: 南非决定修改将国有电力公司拆分为三个独立实体的计划，这一决定遭到了债权人和外国政府资助者的反对。【原文：South Africa’s decision to modify a plan to break up its state-owned power utility into three separate entities is encountering opposition from creditors and foreign government funders.】

item.title: 乌兹别克斯坦将通过新的上市和债券规则拓展本地市场
item.description: 乌兹别克斯坦正在引入新的规则，允许公司进行双重上市和发行以外币计价的债券，为发展其资本市场和吸引投资又迈出了一步。【原文：Uzbekistan is introducing new rules that allow companies to pursue dual listings and issue bonds denominated in foreign currencies, taking another step to develop its capital market and attract investment.】

item.title: 中国又一次可重复使用火箭任务在数周内失败
item.description: 中国一枚发射进入太空的可重复使用火箭未能完成回收任务，这是本月发生的第二起此类事件，也说明了中国在追赶埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司时所面临的困难。【原文：A Chinese reusable rocket that launched into space fell short of its mission to be recovered, marking the second such incident this month and illustrating the difficulties the country faces chasing Elon Musk’s SpaceX.】

item.title: 欧洲 6,350 亿欧元化工行业可能出现兼并潮
item.description: 欧洲 6,350 亿欧元（7,440 亿美元）化工行业的前景从未如此黯淡，这为一波又一波的整合浪潮埋下了伏笔。【原文：The outlook for Europe’s €635 billion ($744 billion) chemicals industry has rarely been grimmer, setting the stage for waves of consolidation.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在创纪录附近徘徊；诺和诺德因药物获批而反弹
item.description: 欧洲股市在创纪录附近徘徊，而诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）则因获准在美国销售其肥胖症特效药 Wegovy 的药丸版本而大涨。【原文：European stocks hovered near a record, while Novo Nordisk A/S rallied as it won approval to sell a pill version of its blockbuster obesity shot Wegovy in the US.】

item.title: 欧尔班部长再次批评中央银行，福林下跌
item.description: 匈牙利经济部长马尔通-纳吉再次呼吁降低利率，并对导致货币升值的央行政策提出质疑，福林随之下跌。【原文：The forint dropped after Hungarian Economy Minister Marton Nagy renewed his calls for lower interest rates and questioned central bank policies which have caused the currency to strengthen.】

item.title: 芬兰陷入几十年来最高失业率的厄运怪圈
item.description: 芬兰的失业率飙升至本世纪以来的最高水平，经济仍陷于自我强化的负循环之中。【原文：Unemployment in Finland soared to the highest level seen this century as the economy remains stuck in a self-reinforcing negative cycle.】

item.title: 三星以 15 亿欧元收购采埃孚驾驶辅助部门
item.description: 三星电子公司旗下的哈曼国际公司（Harman International）将以 15 亿欧元（18 亿美元）的价格从德国采埃孚集团（ZF Group）手中收购一项重要的驾驶辅助业务，因为欧洲汽车供应商行业的财务压力迫使各公司重新考虑其投资组合。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.-owned Harman International is buying a key driver-assistance business from Germany’s ZF Group for €1.5 billion ($1.8 billion), as financial stress across Europe’s auto-supplier sector forces companies to rethink their portfolios.】

item.title: 贷款人要求印度央行控制不断攀升的对冲成本
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一些贷款机构已要求印度央行介入，以遏制对冲成本的急剧上升。【原文：Some lenders have asked India’s central bank to step in to curb a sharp rise in hedging costs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿达尼整合其顶级水泥单位，安布贾股价大涨
item.description: 阿达尼集团（Adani Group）控制的安布贾水泥有限公司（Ambuja Cements Ltd.）在宣布将两家较小的水泥生产商合并的计划后，创下了四个多月来的最大涨幅，因为这家亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）领导的企业集团希望将水泥业务整合为一个整体。【原文：Adani Group-controlled Ambuja Cements Ltd. jumped the most in more than four months after it announced a plan to merge two smaller cement makers with itself as the billionaire Gautam Adani-led conglomerate looks to consolidate this business under a single unit.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将下跌，英镑上涨
